title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Series Hub
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: Every reader who has followed the series realizes they have become part of @HostelReaper's consciousness - the 103rd death is the death of the reader's innocence as they understand they've been complicit in the collection all along.

death_teaser: 102 deaths. One collector. You've been reading the guest book all along.
